name: Search Products PRO
author: SearchProducts

sections.description:
PRO Search Bar for any WooCommerce website! Search Products PRO is integrated with popular page builders and themes.

Elementor and WPBakery Page Builder widgets and elements are included.

Ultimate search options!

This search bar will always find products for any keyword input. Customers will love it.

  • Search by Product SKU
  • Search by Categories
  • Search by Attributes
  • Search by Tags
  • Search by Colors
  • Search by Material
  • Search by Brands
  • Search by Custom Taxonomies
  • Search by Product Meta
  • Search by Price
  • Search by ACF fields
  • Call-Out Search Modal
sections.faq:
Can it filter by product attributes?

Yes! The full list is just above!

Which themes are supported?

Any theme, really. Works with popular themes out of the box!
Avada Theme, Flatsome Theme, the7 Theme, Automattic Storefront
Jupiter Theme, Bridge, Enfold, BeTheme, Salient, Porto Theme
The Gem Theme, Astra Theme, Divi Theme, WoodMart, Porto
Uencode, REHub, XStore, Kalium, Brooklyn, Electro, Impreza
Essentials, Cornerstone, Jannah, X-Theme
